categories.name: Starters
categories.description: Shareable plates to start your meal

items.name: Smoked Wings
items.description: Hickory-smoked chicken wings tossed in your choice of sauce. Served with ranch or blue cheese.

items.name: Chips & Dips
items.description: House-made tortilla chips served with fresh salsa, guacamole, and queso.

items.name: Pretzel Bites
items.description: Warm soft pretzel bites served with beer cheese dip.

items.name: Carne Asada Fries
items.description: Crispy fries topped with seasoned carne asada, cheese, guacamole, and sour cream.

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Grilled flour tortilla filled with melted cheese. Served with salsa and sour cream.

items.name: Baja Green Salad
items.description: Chopped Romaine, Roasted Corn Elote, Sauteed Peppers and Onions, Pico De Gallo, Cotija Cheese, Chipotle Aioli, and Avocado Crema, Choice of Ranch, Red Wine Vinaigrette, or Blue Cheese Dressing.

items.name: Italian Antipasto Salad
items.description: Chopped Romaine, Pepperoni, Kalamata Olives, Red Onion, Oven Roasted Tomatoes, Mushrooms, Pepperoncini, topped with fresh Parmesan, Choice of Red Wine Vinaigrette, Ranch or Blue Cheese Dressing.

items.name: Mount Laguna Caesar
items.description: Chopped Romaine, Topped with House Made Croutons, Parmesan Cheese and Oven Roasted Tomatoes, Served with Creamy Caesar Dressing.

items.name: Slow Smoked BBQ Pork
items.description: Served on a Toasted Brioche Bun, Route 94 BBQ Sauce and French Fries.

items.name: Southern Style Chicken Tenders
items.description: Served with Cole Slaw, French Fries and Ranch.

items.name: VFM California Burrito
items.description: Jumbo Flour Tortilla filled with Carne Asada, French Fries, Roasted Corn Elote, Pico De Gallo, Monterrey Jack Cheese, Avocado Crema and Chipotle Aioli.

items.name: Signature Smash Burger
items.description: Ground Chuck Topped with Umami Onions, American Cheese, Served on a Kings Hawaiian Bun with Secret Sauce and French Fries.

items.name: Route 94 Bacon Burger
items.description: Beef patty with bacon, cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and BBQ sauce. Available in single ($18) or double ($22) patty.

items.name: Tomato Soup + Half Grilled Cheese
items.description: Creamy tomato basil soup paired with a crispy grilled cheese sandwich.

items.name: Cowboy Chili
items.description: Hearty beef and bean chili topped with cheddar, sour cream, and green onions. Served with cornbread.

items.name: Ono Nui
items.description: Smoked Pulled Pork, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Caramelized Onions, Pineapple, Pickled Jalapeños, Chili Garlic Sauce, Five Cheese Blend and Fresh Cilantro.

items.name: Miss Piggy
items.description: Slow Smoked Pulled Pork, Route 94 BBQ Sauce, Caramelized Onions, Pickled Jalapeños, Roasted Garlic, Five Cheese Blend and Fresh Cilantro.

items.name: The Herbivore
items.description: Pepperoncini, Kalamata Olives, Slow Roasted Tomatoes, Roasted Garlic, Red Onions, Marinara, Vegan Mozzarella Served on Vegan Cauliflower Crust.

items.name: Butchers Pizza
items.description: Pepperoni, Italian Sausage, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Smoked Ham, Roasted Garlic, Marinara, Five Cheese Blend.

items.name: Sunrise Highway
items.description: Pepperoni, Mushrooms, Roasted Red Bell Pepper, Oven Roasted Tomato, Roasted Garlic, Marinara, Five Cheese Blend.

items.name: El Barracho
items.description: Magic Pinto Beans, Grilled Carne Asada, Roasted Corn Elote, Sauteed Peppers and Onions, Roasted Garlic, Pickled Jalapeños, Topped with Monterrey Jack and Cotija Cheese, Chipotle Aioli and Fresh Cilantro.

items.name: Cheese Pizza
items.description: Five Cheese Blend, Marinara.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: Pepperoni, Five Cheese Blend, Marinara.

categories.name: Dessert
categories.description: Sweet treats to finish your meal

items.name: Cobbler of the Day
items.description: Cobbler of the Day served with a scoop of Sea Salt Vanilla Bean Ice Cream.

items.name: Root Beer Float
items.description: Mutual Friend Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, and Traditional Root Beer Soda.

items.name: Cole Slaw
items.description: Fresh, creamy coleslaw.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy golden french fries.

items.name: Cornbread
items.description: Warm, buttery cornbread.

items.name: Carrots And Celery
items.description: Fresh cut vegetables with ranch dip.

items.name: Onion Rings
items.description: Beer-battered onion rings fried to golden perfection.

items.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
items.description: Classic grilled cheese on white bread. Served with fries.

items.name: Chicken Nuggets
items.description: Crispy chicken nuggets served with fries and dipping sauce.

items.name: Kids Burger
items.description: Junior burger with cheese. Served with fries.

items.name: Mac N Cheese
items.description: Creamy macaroni and cheese.
